attributes.action: oblige airline companies to fully refund airport passenger duties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scenario: you are unable to get a flight, therefore, you will almost certainly loose the flight cost (low cost airlines), the only refundable sum is the government tax applied to your flight.
To obtain a refund, you will be charged anything between £ 15 and £ 30, so if you are entitled to a refund, it will be in the order of £ 5 to £ 15.
If you don't fly, the airline keep the tax, as they are only obliged the pay the government if you fly! This is unfair, a full refund should be made automatically, perphaps less the actual transaction cost.
